name: aem-junit-skill
description: AEM JUnit Testing skill for AI assistants - Comprehensive guide for testing Adobe Experience Manager with JUnit

scripts.test:cli: node bin/run.js help && node bin/run.js deps && node bin/run.js template model
scripts.postinstall: echo 'AEM JUnit Skill installed! Run: npx aem-junit-skill help'

author: Narendra Gandhi
